benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

benefits.name: Peerless Aim
effects: When you miss with an attack roll, you can hit instead. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until the start of your next turn.
